sqlReaderQuery.value:
;WITH [TenList] AS (
	SELECT 0 AS [Id] UNION ALL
	SELECT 1 AS [Id] UNION ALL
	SELECT 2 AS [Id] UNION ALL
	SELECT 3 AS [Id] UNION ALL
	SELECT 4 AS [Id] UNION ALL
	SELECT 5 AS [Id] UNION ALL
	SELECT 6 AS [Id] UNION ALL
	SELECT 7 AS [Id] UNION ALL
	SELECT 8 AS [Id] UNION ALL
	SELECT 9 AS [Id]
), [FullList] AS (
  SELECT (([One].[Id] + [Ten].[Id] * 10) + [Hundred].[Id] * 100) + [Thousand].[Id] * 1000 + [TenThousand].[Id] * 10000 AS [Number]
  FROM       TenList AS [One] 
  CROSS JOIN TenList AS [Ten] 
  CROSS JOIN TenList AS [Hundred] 
  CROSS JOIN TenList AS [Thousand]
  CROSS JOIN TenList AS [TenThousand]
)

SELECT
	 [Number] AS [IntNumber]
	,CAST(REPLICATE('abc',10) AS nvarchar(30)) AS [ShortText]
	,CAST(REPLICATE('abc',1000) AS nvarchar(MAX)) AS [LongText]
	,CAST([Number] AS DECIMAL(38,19))/1000 AS [DecimalNumber]
FROM FullList
ORDER BY Number
